Name: Dragon Eggs
Description: Always wanted to raise a dragon but couldn't find a quality egg? We've got you covered. These high quality fresh dragon eggs just need to be incubated in a standard lava chamber and will produce the finest dragon pups.

Name: Beanstalk Beans
Description: Holiday in the kingdom of giants and bag yourself a golden egg or two as souvenirs; simply plant, wait, and climb. Alternatively, add them to a meal (chilli works great) and become a giant yourself!

Name: Messenger Boots
Description: Flying doesn't have to be a pipe dream. Take to the skies in these snazzy hermetic messenger boots and open up a new world of adventure, just watch out for passing planes!

Name: Magic Focusing Hat
Description: Spells keep going awry? Can't seem to direct your mystical energy in the right direction? Try this top of the line focusing hat, guaranteed to direct and amplify your innate ability beyond your wildest dreams!

Name: Knight's Blade
Description: Hack and slash through anything with this legendary longsword, imbued with stamina and strength boosting magic.

Name: Elvish Ring of Power
Description:
Mystical power beyond imagining, and invisibility to boot!

Caution: side effects may include being hunted by the dark lord Sauron and his legion of evil orcs.
